mapper.insert: insert into t_role (id, code, name, insert_time, update_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{insertTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.select: select id, code, name, insert_time, update_time from t_role
